abilities.name: Sturdy
abilities.description: In battle, if the holder's HP falls to zero, it will not faint and will still be at zero HP.

abilities.name: Unnerve
abilities.description: The opponent is impeded in its attempts to use an item.

abilities.name: Marvel Scale
abilities.description: The Pokémon takes less damage from each hit. With a status condition such as Burn, also increases Attack stat.

abilities.name: Technician
abilities.description: When the holder's Attack stat is lower, the attack power of its moves are increased by a multiplier that depends on how low its Attack stat is in relation to base.

abilities.name: Hurricane's Appearance
abilities.description: Has percent chance (if choice Item Active is turned off) of changing its primary and secondary types to a random description

abilities.name: Insanity
abilities.description:
